description: A React functional component named Banner that displays a hero image with overlay text, gradient background, and call-to-action buttons. It accepts props for image URL, title, subtitle, and a callback for the 'Watch Now' button.

methods.name: Banner({ image = '/images/banner.svg', title = 'Featured', subtitle = '', onWatch })
